scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the R.D. Blackmore Collection consists of an one page letter, March 4, 1876, from Blackmore to Miss Shute, thanking her "for your very kind & useful work & I hope that the balance will be accepted , as a trifling contribution towards an urgent case. If you are at liberty next week it will give me great pleasure to play a game any day after Monday."
